title: wiimmfi-patcher-v3_2
description:
This patcher is a generic Wii-Image patcher. it exchange "https" by "http" and the domain "nintendowifi.net" by "wiimmfi.de". This is necessary to support the new Wiimmfi server. The thread Multi Game Support will call the games.

The patcher does:
* Patch a Wii image while copying it.
* It replace "nintendowifi.net" by "wiimmfi.de" (the new domain system for our server).
Now follow these steps to patch your MKWii, any custom-variants or other games to the new server:

1.Copy all images you want to patch into the Windows folder.
2.Windows-User now start the create-image.bat
3.Now all games in the folder get patched.
After patching, you find the new images in the folder wiimmfi-images.
You can now copy those to your HDD or USB-Stick.
List Of Supported Games:
RUUJ Animal Crossing Wii
RX3E ExciteBots: Trick Racing (NTSC-U)
ST7J Fortune Street Wii
RMCJ Mario Kart Wii
R4QP Mario Strikers Charged (PAL)
R4QE Mario Strikers Charged (USA)
RPBJ Pokemon Battle Revolution
S3IE Pro Evolution Soccer 2013 (NTSC)
S3IP Pro Evolution Soccer 2013 (PAL)
R3RP Sonic & SEGA All-Stars Racing
RSBJ Super Smash Bros. Brawl
STKJ Tatsunoko VS. Capcom: Ultimate All Stars
RCJE The Conduit
SC2E The Conduit 2 (USA)
SLSJ The Last Story (Japan)
SLSE The Last Story (NTSC)
SLSP The Last Story (PAL)
RDSE Dragon Ball Z Budokai Tenkaichi 3
